Landing_Hero_description: Cultchain is a blockchain based charity which aims to bring transparency and Trust to Charities and NGOs.
NFT_MARKETPLACE_description: Revolutionizing Charity with Blockchain & AI | From Cityscapes to Digital Benevolence
DONATE_TRANSPARENTLY_Title: We Bring Trust and Transparency to NGOs
DONATE_TRANSPARENTLY_Description: Donors should know how their donation are spended. This is the most important challenge that each traditional NGO or Charity is faced.
Transparency_Description: Web3 is about transparent world and communication, specially in financial activities.
Trust_Based_Description: Web3 is about transparent world and communication, specially in financial activities.
Community_Proof_Description: Community Driven Ecosystem gives power to the engaged people and they decide about it
Open_to_NGOs_Description: Our Platform is also open to other NGOs and Charities.
NFT_Power_Description: We incentivize good acts by donating Non-Fungible Tokens, Users can earn this badges as a proof for social benefit tasks.
Corporate_Social_Responsibilites_Descrip: We offer CSR packages for corporate users and help others on behalf of the corporations
Helpful_Resources_Description: Feel Free to investigate useful resources provided by our team to learn more about this new market.
Comment_Description: Cultchain is a brand new effort to solve conventional charities problems with Cutting Edge Technologies which bring Trust and Transparency.
